## registry.hasItem() function

Returns whether or not the registry contains an item with the given type and name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hasItem<T>(type: string | Type<T>, name: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string \| Type&lt;T&gt; | The type of the plugin. (e.g. Field, Renderer) |
|  name | string | The plugin's name. (Ex. field\_angle, geras)  True if the registry has an item with the given type and name, false otherwise.  Blockly.registry.hasItem |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
